pr_title: [HUDI-335] Improvements to DiskBasedMap used by ExternalSpillableMap,…

timeline.message: [HUDI-335] Improvements to DiskBasedMap used by ExternalSpillableMap, for write and random/sequential read paths, by introducing bufferedRandmomAccessFile

timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: Yes Vinoth.  This is our own implementation of BufferedRandomAccessFile.
replies.author: nbalajee

replies.bodyText:
Thanks!
@bvaradar @n3nash should we then back out the license change.. I am confused.
replies.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: @vinothchandar @nbalajee : I think we should still retain the LICENSE part and the reference in this file to be conservative as this implementation was based on the Cassandra source code and the structure is essentially same. It is better to err on the side of caution here. Let me know if you strongly think otherwise (cc @n3nash ).
replies.author: bvaradar
